titleStmt.title: [Young man's joy, and the maids happiness] or, A pretty dialogue, between two amorous lovers., The young-man woo'd the damosel fair, and soon obtain'd her faivour, so they became a loving pair, twas fit that he should have her ... : To the tune of, My father gave me house and land.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. vere, and J. Wright.,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped, with partial loss of title. Title suggested by Wing.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
